segments.text: If you're observant you'll see rare birds , insects , butterflies , and a few reptiles . But you must look for them . There are also a few am-phibians in lower places .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let's move , I can see a rest area ahead.We can relax there , and see what wildlife is around ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Huh ! I am really out-of-shape , Why aren't you out-of-breath ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I come hiking every week . That's why I'm in good-shape . I think that I should bring you a walkingstick next time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How can you say that ? But , you could give me a piggyback the rest of the way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , you want me to carry your backpack , your thermos flask , our picnic , and you as well . No problem , jump on .
segments.speaker: S2
